title: Grandeur Hosiery Girls' Ultra Soft Convertible Tights
features: Size 4-6 - Height 38”-45” / Weight 35-50 Lbs. Size 6-8 - Height 45”-51” / Weight 50-62 Lbs. Size 8-10 - Height 51”-56” / Weight 62-74 Lbs. Size 10-12 - Height 56”-60” / Weight 74-90 Lbs. Size 12-14 - Height 60”-64” / Weight 90-100 Lbs. Size A - Height 64”-66” / Weight 100-110 Lbs. Size B - Height 66”-68” / Weight 110-125 Lbs.
Round opening at the bottom, convertible between footed and footless
Fine smooth look for daily wear & any dance type
Silky, soft & comfortable with great performance
Hand Wash, Dark colors separately, Do not bleach
description: Grandeur hosiery girls’ ultra-soft convertible tights are silky & comfortable. Composed of 87% spandex / 13% nylon for long lasting quality & performance. Features a knit-in waistband and a round opening at the bottom of the sole, to convert between footed and footless. Its fine smooth look makes it perfect for any dance type and even daily wear.
